alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 10:04PM MST until February 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches for elevations below 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches for elevations above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Dobson Pass, Coeur d`Alene, Fernwood, Ione, Bonners Ferry, Clark Fork, Orin-Rice Road, Fruitland, Metaline Falls, Mullan, Hayden, Fourth Of July Pass, Lookout Pass, Kellogg, Springdale-Hunters Road, Kettle Falls, Post Falls, Pinehurst, Chewelah, Colville, Northport, Sandpoint, Wallace, Newport, Athol, Worley, St. Maries, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Priest River, Deer Park, Metaline, Osburn, Eastport, Tiger, and Flowery Trail Road. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle
